content: Awful drop in Amazon's quality of service! Their previous version worked great. It was fast, intuitive, and never from the bugs this one has. It won't even my home page at Amazon anymore. I've tried everything they recommend to fix it, including uninstalling and reinstalling... No joy. I'm going to try the latter one more time, after... I dunno.

It's always a hit or miss with amazon. There has been more then a few times my order is lost/delivered to a wrong address. Then I have to wait an extra day or two. What's the point of being charged $100+ for amazon prime when the package is gonna take a regular amount of days to ship because the order was lost/delivered to a wrong address. So again excellent service or typical just wait for a solution. 50/50

Very slow in responding to certain clicks. Poor quality app. For instance when I want to read the reviews for a particular item for the first time I click on the reviews for that item . I have to click it 9 or 10 times for the app to respond. Also super laggy in others area through the like slow in responding to clicks. My Prime Video and Music app works fine. No laggs. Please fix. Until I might use my own personal laptop or the mobile site on my phone.

I've been an Amazon customer for at least 10 years now. I rarely have issues with the app but now I can't find the wish list tray. Has it been removed? This to me, was the best part of the app experience as it made it easy to add items to your list as you browse, especially when recommendations or "customers also viewed/bought" pops up and you want to add all those items to your list as well. Please bring back the list tray!!! It's efficient!

Updated from 5‚≠ê's to 2‚≠ê's. I've used this app for years without any issues but recently it's been running EXTREMELY slow. Especially when viewing product details, when there are options to choose from. Takes a minimum of 15-20 seconds before you can scroll through the photos of a product with options and another 15-20 seconds anytime you change an option to view it. It's really becoming quite frustrating. eBay doesn't do that.. just saying. Needs to get the bugs out of the last update and soon

I've had this app for years and never had issues until the last two updates. IT IS SO SLOW!!! Nothing else on my phone operates at the sloth speed that this Amazon app now works at. It's very glitchy, takes forever if you want to see the different options of an item, things like applying filters and scrolling through to choose a department is a waste of time, because it'll never reload. This has been an ongoing issue for weeks. Fix it already!

Amazon has become a repository of knock-off items. It's virtually impossible to search for an item, with the hopes of seeing the offerings by major brands because most of what populates the search is cheap imitations from "manufacturers" with comical sounding names. Even if you enter a specific search term, including the brand, the search still brings up everything else in the category. The filter process is slow and cumbersome, too.

I bought a couple of items from Amazon a few years back but recently downloaded the app, big mistake. Had trouble with the 3 items I tried to buy. 1st item - lost during dispatch, 2nd item - amazon mistakenly cancelled order on my behalf 3rd item - amazon took order and I was charged even though item was out of stock, they never checked, never told me, only for I contacted them, appalling customer service. Still awaiting substantial refund after 7 working days. AVOID!!! I'm deleting my account

I love the Amazon's deals & delivery svc. Just be sure to watch your bank statement! I was charged 10.99 per month for 6 months for Prime, but cancelled free trial b4 it ended. Cust. Svc. reps-clueless, couldn't find glitch & said I "wasn't getting billed!" They make promises they don't keep to research & correct error. Was never credited the $66+ billed in error. Delivery service gets 3 stars. Fast, but need to follow customer del. instr's!

I have experience with Amazon India & Canada. The switching experience is not fluid. Amazon India has COD option, which is great & I do not have to provide my Credit Card. Amazon Canada has no such option. When crossing borders, I have to switch to the country I am in. Shipping is also complicated and may be more expensive than the product. Search filters are very limited. Amazon Canada enforces control over customer reviews & will not show reviews, even though no foul language used.

I love shopping on amazon. But lately it's been a hassle. Starting with how lagging it's been lately. Also I hate, hate, hate. How they switched it In the app that your orders appear in the order they are delivered and not ordered. And everytime you click out of an order from orders it takes you back to the beginning! Which is annoying when you're trying to figure out how much someone owes you and you order 100+ things a month!! Update** now you can't upload pics for reviews on the app..

Awful update. Front page is just a big advert for music and tv/movies. When I open Amazon shopping, I expect to go there to find things I want to buy. Looking for a product is difficult now because products are not side by side like the web page. Terrible update, I'm going to just use the web page through my browser, and get rid of the PITA app, I'll use the newly freed up space for Ebay.

App is generally really nice, clean interface smooth action, crisp transitions to next product. The reason for 3 stars is, I have a few items I "save for later" , everytime I log on there is always a message in my cart about "new information of a product Your cart" when I click on this link, well nothing happens. System freezes on a blank screen.

The app no longer shows suggested shopping stuff on the main page, instead it shows ads for amazon prime movies, music, audiobooks, books, and magazines so I no longer can easily browse for things or look at products I may like or need based on my purchases or searches. It literally makes me not use it as much and not GIVE PEOPLE MOMEY. I did previously LOVE the app and Amazon prime, but the change in the home screen is a HUGE deterant.

Slow, hard to use, and dramatically inferior to its predecessor. This app tries to do too much, and does most of it badly. The previous app was focused on quickly and efficiently finding products and getting them ordered. This one chugs through searches as it loads a million things you don't want and pictures you won't look at. Lag when increasing the number of items, color, or size take 30 seconds or longer. Stick with the old one as long add you can. I'm sorry I "upgraded."

Liked better before it was invaded by Amazon content ads. Used to be easier to browse but that is gone and replaced by Prime Video ads, Audible ads, etc. There's no easy way to browse thru possible options you have to go to the area your shopping for and find your item. Can't access lightning deals or gold box with ease. Very unhappy with this version

This app is no longer efficient or reliable. #1) it notifies me that my PICKUP LOCATIONS are NOT available or are CLOSED... When in Fact, online those locations are available. THIS CAUSED UNNECESSARY need to find alternate locations that are not convenient.... 2) Filtering Criteria for products... Does not allow you to check each filter at one time. Instead, it takes an individual checked filter at a time. Very tedious lengthy process which defeats the purpose of using the filter.

Very bad service service client, having now a problem regarding a product they sent, was completely wrong, was not what I have ordered, they don't send the label for return, I had to pay the shipping cost by my self even the mistake was theirs, now is almost 1 month waiting for a refund. I can't even see who was the seller, Amazon or a third part... They won't let me know. I would like to write a review to them too, because they made a big mistake, making me lose a lot time

I ordered an item using Prime and it said it would be delivered in 2 days when planning the order. Unfortunately, due to the COVID-19 pandemic, they delayed it for over a month. That was understandable, however, they refused to let me cancel the item so I could go buy it in person elsewhere. If they can't deliver the products, they should allow for reasonable cancellations.

Usually a fine app, but the latest update changed the ui and the main screen dosnt even have items for sale anymore, it's all ads for Amazon services. To look at items you need to search for them, when I always really enjoyed seeing the products recommended based my on interests on my home screen. At this point not sure how to access the deals section anymore.

Lately the app has become frustrating üò†. Normally when I've made a purchase, I click the continue shopping button at the bottom of the order confirmation screen. Just recently, Amazon has starting putting small banner adds that are timed to pop up right where the Continue Shopping button is located a split second before I click it. It happens almost right before I click, and I inadvertently click the ad instead. As a result, I'm adjusting my habits to close the app after a purchase instead.

I hate the new look. The app updates and the first thing you see eveytime you use the app are ads for Amazon prime video, and music, and audiobooks. I don't want to see that. I want to see recommended items to buy, or the different categories of items. Now I have to scroll all the way to the bottom of the page to see this section which used to be at the top. Please. Don't fix whay isn't broken.

Sometimes it likes to act weird and slow then crashes or restarts itself when I'm looking for things. Searching for items can be a hassle. It will tell me how much is in the search but I don't always get to see that amount. I also see some items over and over again(from the same seller) like it's repeating itself. Leaving a review gets annoying since it won't let me add pictures from my phone's gallery.

The app is really on my nerves as of late! It's been extremely slow and I can't tell you how many times I have to hit "proceed to checkout" in order to checkout! Most of the time I can't even get to the checkout page until I either remove and readd the item I'm trying to purchase from my cart or close out completely and try again! It's very frustrating and time consuming!! The camera and barcode feature also rarely ever pull up what you are looking for. Come on Amazon, you can do better!!

Lately the app won't let me make any purchases unless I re-enter my full credit card number each time I want to buy something. It makes it ridiculously inconvenient to make a purchase. I don't carry my credit cards everywhere like my phone. The phone is encrypted, and uses biometric authentication. I don't understand what reason to require me to enter the credit card number every time.

The update sucks! After updating and switching to Amazon smile on phone now I can't find the daily deals, very frustrating. I get maybe you are focusing on the covid-19 pandemic but don't bury the deals so far down nobody can find them. Just suspend daily deals in general if you are going to focus on essential items. But also remember we are all paying $120 a year for prime and still have certain expectations.

My experience is based more on Amazon services. I'm a first time user of this app and service and my experience has been the worst. I sent an expensive order through just to be told that I didn't pay enough and certain items wasn't available. How do you steal people money then say....oh, you need to add more. I don't play when it comes to my hard earned money and they could at least have the decency to return the funds for items you don't receive. This is extremely poor customer service.

Worst app I have ever used! This thing freezes all the time, especially when I am adding something to my cart. I have to wait forever to get back to the previous screen. Also, trying to delete anything from my cart or from my lists is ridiculous! How ancient is this app? Get with the program Amazon! Amazon site also slow on my laptop. Smh If you're not going to fix this slow app then at least make it so I can delete multiple items from my lists instead of 1 at a slow time. How antiquated!

Poorest customer experience I have ever experienced. Delivered to wrong address and I had to find the address that it was delivered to, and that was based off of a picture of the "delivered" goods. Customer service wouldn't offer any sort of compensation for the inconvenience of searching for my package. And thank the stars that the person which whom it was delivered, was nice and gave it back. Horrible, horrible service. My prime account has been canceled. Bad service altogether.

I've used this app for many years without issue (especially happy to be an early smile adopter) however a recent update has degraded in performance significant, and the my orders page constantly starts at the top when I got back after viewing an order. I have many orders so when I'm trying to track status of a particular one I have to scroll down quite a bit over and over. It makes it difficult to use the app and I often wait until I'm at a computer and then don't end up ordering.

I buy almost everything on Amazon I rarely go to stores that anymore... One of the things I pretty much do every day is open the app go to the deals of the day and browse through those, Often buying things from that list. And now is the most recent update they remove this from the app there are no more deals of the day or they're not easily accessible through the app.

Can't stand the message centre. Overall shopping experience is great until you have to return setting and you can't send the seller an image fe to go with your case. I'm not someone who uses a PC or a laptop and I do all work from my phone but it's annoying that I cannot properly send messages to sellers as it comes up with crappy context.

It technically works, but it's literally just the website with a shell around it. Images are all lower resolution than a 2001 flip phone. It lags on even the fastest devices. Pages don't fit the screen right so scrolling is weird. And good luck looking through product images without it scrolling down. I hope Amazon lets the devs free from their cages and finds new ones to fix the app.

The Amazon service is good, but the app experience is cumbersome and irritating. The filter menu is slow to load and closes each time you select or deselect an item, so selecting multiple filters is painfully time-consuming. The item size and color screens are extremely slow to load. I frequently get kicked to my phone's lock screen when browsing.

This app is unbelievably slow and unresponsive. It makes browsing Amazon an absolute chore. EDIT: Two months later and it's only gotten slower and more unresponsive. It took over five minutes to add two items to my cart. Amazon is clearly not interested in making this app better. They're too busy adding useless features like Alexa support and "donate to your favorite charity."

I only gave it 2 stars because they use dogs when my page doesn't load. Since the update I can not use the app it just tells me something went wrong. I've uninstalled and reinstalled. I've changed my password. I've logged off and logged back on. I've even emailed the developers. Nothing. It's way to frustrating I dont even try anymore!

I pay $120 a year for Amazon Prime. I DO NOT WANT TO SEE ADVERTISING WHEN SHOPPPING VIA APP. Why does the app have ads for items I'm looking for at the top and bottom of the screen. It reduces the number of available results it can show and I'm ALREADY PAYING A PREMIUM for your service. Get rid of the ads!

Extremely slow whenever view pictures, change options or use filters. Filters are limited and barely useful. Have to make one selection, then back to product, click on filters, make another selection, back to product, rinse and repeat. Ridiculously long wait for filters to re-open. Sort function is entirely useless. Unless sorted by featured, the app eliminates the majority of search hits - from hundreds down to 20 - 30 (or less) when changed to sort by price, etc. Intentional?

I wanted next day delivery and it said prime would be able to do so. I get prime and it tells me that may stuff will be here in a week and that was the previous free delivery option. Terrible company. Absolute scam. No way to get in touch to rectify the issue. Every time I use it I feel stupid for doing so. Next time I'll just go to the shops. I just read some of the positive reviews and they're definitely bots. They just sound like adverts do because that's what they are.

It seems as though this app isn't as compatible with cellphones as it is with laptops and iPads. It is very slow and doesn't recognize when I touch a button the first time. Usually I have to touch the button 2 or 3 times then I have to wait on the app to complete the action. I hate using this app on my phone but the previous version is now obsolete and not recognized.

The latest update is absolutely terrible and frustrating. The amazon deals section is completely gone and has been replaced with irrelevant ads. Please correct your new update, its complete garbage. Every time I go into the app now, I just leave and look at other store apps. Whoever decided it was a great idea to change the home page to a bunch of ads should be demoted.

Back in February, I pre-ordered ff7r and a few other things. It kept saying not enough on the card when we called them, it was enough. I let some items go but kept the game and a movie. I ordered some more things, now it's saying the same thing and there is 80+ money on the damn card!!! The order was 66 dollars!! I've had enough. What's the damn deal? I've had enough. 0 stars if I could.

This app is sooo slow! The original was lightning fast. The latency between touches is seriously seconds. I can use it to browse slowly but other than that useless. Don't open any menus either or you'll be waiting for ages as it loads. Poorly optimized and probably raking all my phone data. Just use a PC avoid this app.

The app does exactly as it says and it delivers amazing products. However 1the shipping is the let time. I have prime and the time changes constantly for the orders. I know this isnt amazon's fault but it's annoying. I have ordered something and it is getting delivered soon but earlier it said it would be delivered from 1:15 to 3:15 but now it says 4:00 to 6:00. It can be irritating because the time isn't accurate and is constantly changing.

One of the worst auto chat systems through customer service I've ever dealt with. You can't ask a question about an order. You have multiple choice subjects and all you get is the status of the item. If you choose the selection of having a problem with an order, you can't explain the problem, all you get is the status of the item. You can't even chat with a live person without going through the useless automated system and even then, you're lucky if you can get someone or get the help you need.

I wish I could give review ZERO. The worst online shopping app I've ever used. I made an order with next day delivery (2TB hard drive), then I received late after 2 days. The delivered item was wrong as it was (1TB only). Finally when I talked to customer service to replace the item with the right one, the answer was "it's not available". Just you have to return the item or accept 50 Dirhams as a price difference (and the actual price difference between both items 100 Dirhams on the app)

Absolutely horrible. I have made over 40 orders in the past 60 days and I pay for prime. I never get my orders when guaranteed, I have video of Amazon drivers throwing my package out of the van and hit another car before hitting the ground, I have contacted customer service countless times and they always say that they're passing it on to the right people to take care of the problem but it keeps happening.

Thanks Amazon. Using the Subscribe function they let me know the day it's supposed ship that they are out. I've been subscribed to these items for years. Shouldn't a company the size, scope, and experience of Amazon store items that are non perishable and and under subscription to their regular customers? Nope. Should I continue using Amazon and their app? Nope.

Lots of selections to choose from. You can do all your shopping needs with Amazon. Name brand items some are way to expensive but some are better. I think everyone should try shopping with Amazon at least one time in there life to see just how good the experience is , I'm sure once you do you will be back with this app you can have it all I just love that this app is available for users to enjoy shopping.

Had the app decide to start ordering for me costing currently $85 and counting in nsf/overdraft fees. According to customer service it is " entirely impossible as the app doesn't work that way just return it and we will refund it" and yet I'm being resent these same packages ... very poor relations will NEVER use Amazon again. Worst experience with any online shopping system.

Slow?!?! Using a note 8 and an s10e. This app lags, slow, imo garbage app for a billion dollar compamy. Stop being cheap Amazon and help your customers buy stuff faster. Waiting to select, add cart, checkout, long list, etc wastes all our time. Fix it the problem. Your now our monopoly, would be nice have nice to have a good gui. Ebay doesn't have these problems. Follow up. App is still garbage

Was good, then became unusable all together. I would suggest looking for other delivery options till they get everything sorted. Especially if you are stuck at home. I can't wait 2 months for delivery while paying a prime membership for essentials. Then told not available in your area at checkout after being a member for years. Yes I have consideration for the situation, but within reason. This is my personal opinion.

The app and most of the process are great however not a single package has been delivered correctly yet. After contacting customer service multiple times and being assured by many staff members that the problem would not continue it still persists after months of being a Prime member. It's horrible and I finally cancelled my subscription. Just tired of the issue and being lied to about it being fixed.

Very disappointed that we are paying for prime but having to wait on shipping. I understand the epidemic, however one would think that a company would automatically be like, oops my bad, have a free month because we cant give you Express shipping at this time. But nope, full price we pay, for standard shipping...BAD BUSINESS!

Amazon is a great app especially with 2 day delivery. My issue is their delivery people. I've complained multiple times and they still deliver to the wrong address, even with instructions. I just had $90 shoes stolen by the house owner because it was delivered to the wrong address. I can't prove she took it but she doesn't seem to be a trust worthy neighbor and Amazon keeps delivering my packages there!!!

Slow not user friendly. Filter options are a joke, kicking you out of the menu to results each time you select one filter. Almost every ecommerce app keeps you in the filtering section for multiple choices. Very slow as if we're going back to the 90's again. Overall Amazon is turning into the New Walmart but without the speed and uiux we expect as consumers.

This app is terrible. I have a new GalaxyNote10 phone and bvb this app can't g ok 72 hours without freezing up and has to be uninstalled, then re-installed. sucks! I am a huge Amazon fan. The proble.s with this app do not impede my ability or willingness to shop at Amazon but it would be a convenient option. The only thing I use this app for is to process returns when I'm not in front of my PC. Hey, Anazon, you can do much better.

Wish list isn't like it used to be, miss the filter for dvd, book,and other, just shows just purchased and purchased and high and low prices. Plus on my tablet Samsung tab S6 when I go into open orders it just let's me view them and if I want to cancel anything I have to go to my PC, and it does the same for my Samsung phone A50, never had this issue before just be due to recent update. Please fix.

I've used prime for about a year. I've never had a problem with shipping or my profucts!! I did unknowingly order a product that had a monthly shipment and bill, I was able to cancel immediately upon realizing. There are great deals to be found!! The wrbdite is super easy snd it keeps track of everything!!

Great app, Amazon great deals most of the time.... If there's one thing that I cannot understand is, why are my Amazon "messages" so many clicks away from accessing and why isn't their an in-app notification for my messages? I lost multiple orders because I didn't know I was getting messages. Messages should be easier to get to GEEZ! PERFECT CONCEPT, PERFECT PRICES, PERFECT CUSTOMER SERVICE TIMING.... BUT WHY MISS OUT ON ONE BIG THING? I DON'T GET IT

This app is clunky, frustrating, and slow. Whether it's between info not displaying correctly, to crashes (on my Pixel 4XL), to just how slow and confusing it is to browse product listings, reviews, and essentially everything you need for a good shopping experience. Many times I just swap to my computer after failing with the app.

New app is worse than previous version. Filter button takes for ever to open and you can only change one filter at a time - then it's back to the main screen to do it all again. Can we not just be able to change all the filters we need, and then press "Done"? App is also a lot slower now.

Very unusual I am not used to shopping on Amazon and the prices that you're charging for your products are still way too high it's always nice to know that the shipping and handling is free if you order a certain amount of an item but it's still way too expensive yes I know it's for convenience that you have all of these products but when you're shopping on Amazon you expect to get a bargain and if you sell stuff reasonably enough and many people will buy stuff but I'm pretty sure that you have

Amazon, stop with trying to trick us into monthly or bi-monthly purchases of items. You make it very easy to click that orange button "setup now". Aren't you a large enough money machine? If people want ongoing purchases, put that option off to the side somewhere. I hate that kind of trickery.

This app is great for shopping. However the prime membership off ers can be extremely dangerous and invasive. Whenever going to make a purchase i recommend double checking to make sure that your not paying for prime too. This happened to me and can easily happen to you if your not cautious

The new update is garbage im seriously considering getting rid of prime and do my shopping elsewhere. Plus they announced that unless you order essential goods it will take a month or longer to get items.whats the point of having amazon prime if it takes a month to get items.i have ordered from elsewhere and got them in 2 days.Amazon has never had this problem before on prime day or Christmas.

Just so NOT happy with Amazon right now! I know the country has a 'situation' right now, but I don't feel I should have to pay the full Prime monthly price if I can't get 2-3 day delivery now. They should offer at least 20% off the monthly rate. Now, I might as well risk going out so I can get my items sooner. And if I'm going OUT, why use - and pay for - Amazon's "service"?

Super frustrating when trying to sort items from 'lowest to highest' or 'by customer reviews' etc. Not sure if this is confusing bit, when doing an item search and there are tons that match the description (lets say over 10,000) and you want to narrow the search by the filter functions. If I pick 'filter' 'sort by' then by 'price-lowest to highest' then only a portion of that original 10,000 item list will get cut down to a fraction of that, say 500, where did the other 9,500 items go?

Why is my home page all about Prime video until the bottom of the page? You have a separate app for Prime Video. I want to browse...to think about fun things to buy and you are ruining it. Stop it, please. Alternatively, tell me I did something to make it happen or how to fix it, please. üòÅ I need the comfort of shopping...it gives me something to look forward to.

Its ok. The layout of the website on my phone is better than the layout of the app. The website is more intuitive for me. The app tends to show some search results that aren't what I'm looking for whereas the website keeps that to a minimum. I only installed the app because Amazon won't leave me alone about it. Try the app. Do you have the app? Open the search on the app. The app the app the app. Well I tried it for a couple days. App is also slower than the website. Uninstalled. YMMV

They have millions of products. They have millions of vendors. They con you in by claiming, "free 2-day delivery" on prime eligible items. But in my experience, I have never received an item in less than 7 days. I have always kicked myself because e-bay usually has the same thing a little bit cheaper. Or Walmart. Com . It doesn't make me feel like giving them 5 stars. Funny thing is this isn't Christmas season. It's technically slow season here in March......

Cancellation visual misleadings, when i cancel an item it shows that its not guarrenteed which i get when it comes to near shipment but it also shows that itll email me when cancelled which it doesnt but yet when i go to "my orders" the item isnt listed which gets me to think its been cancelled succefully but when it comes to the day it was suppose to arrive, it does & im still charged for it...

I am very disappointed with the way Amazon uses your financial information. I had previously had a problem with my Prime membership, and just dealt with a major issue. I was charged once on my debit card for my membership on March 14th, then on March 19th the debit card linked to my husband's account was charged again. I contacted Amazon and thought it was corrected, but my account was canceled. I contacted them again and I was refunded, but still no membership. I'm so frustrated!!!

Can't leave reviews with photos anymore. That's literally the only benefit to using the app over a computer, you can upload pics straight from your phone to the review. Now I have to email myself the pics and save them to my laptop, then write a review. Lame.

Decent app for quick access to shopping and browsing. As other users have mentioned, please allow selection of multiple filter choices before closing the filter menu, instead of closing it after each individual filter selection.

ZERO stars. Website won't let you (online) ask a product question or contact customer service without an account. They will NEVER get my business if they can't address a concern BEFORE handing over personal information. Btw, website gives 3 choices to choose from for reasons I wanted to contact and each message was the same. Call the same customer service phone. Pointless.

This app has gotten worse with time. The share option has stopped providing a "copy link" option which is irritating when you just want a link for posting into something else such as an email body you're composing. Boggling considering links would be a source of promoting sales and revenue.

This last update is aweful! I hate it. Has stupid stuff like books, I am shopping, NOT reading books. That is what my Amazon book app is for! Hopefully this gets fixed Soon. Has irrelevant suggestions. No Deal of the day as the first thing you see. Guess no one will be purchasing if the have to go click here then there just to see it. Sales may decline. Begging you to change this back... Guess I will shop the WAL-MART app.

Its gotten to the point where I had to cancel everything and make a new account twice because Amazon keeps locking me out because I ordered one pair of shoes. I appreciate the protection but it's a bit overkill.

Good app for buying whatevers on the internet. But if your a Prime member be WARNED they will NOT notify you when they charge you for prime!! No email ahead of time and no explanation for why it increases! If your in the middle of this COVID-19 hell like I am and counting every penny you have, then Amazon takes $125 of your money with NO WARNING!! Absolutely no emails, no notifications, nothing. Now I have to cancel the membership to get the money back so I can pay rent next week. FU Amazon

Of the few times I use the app, the app not only didn't save my zip code when I chenged it, it butchered my address after it supposedly saved it, cutting out portions of the address and causing my package to be shipped miles away from me. I am pissed. Will have to be careful using this platform again and likely won't.

Painfully slow when trying to: view product images, select sizes or colors, save an item to a wishlist. Also seems to let you view only the first 10 or so questions. Whoever wrote this app should be ashamed. It's worse than a CS student's co-op work-term project. More like it was written by a high school dropout who took a Java bootcamp.

The latest update has turned the front page into a ton of advertisements for streaming video. I don't use this app for streaming video, I use it to shop and find deals on things I need. The hot deals section is now completely gone.

Hate this app everytime I make a purchase I immediately get locked out my account. I have made about 5 different accounts and they keep doing the same thing and when I make a purchase the money comes off my card but then they email me saying my purchase is canceled or can't be shipped. UGH in done with this app

Top notch customer service is unfortunately not matched by a top notch app experience. Really broken flow for payment - you don't even find out what you are going to be paying till almost the last step. REALLY broken customer service flow, you just keep going back and forth to figure out where you can contact customer service. Not sure what is broken here (operations?), but one day I am receiving my parcel, next day it's being returned to seller, a day later, I am receiving it again. No thanks!

The daily deals/lightning deals/watching deals tab has disappeared. It was available a few days ago but it's not there anymore.
